column1: Local Foods////This has always been a mainstay in my life ever since I was a freshman in college.  Fresh ingredients
column3: and reasonably priced.  I am obsessed with their Smoked Salmon Sandwich; onion jam (heavenly!)
column5: fresh greens and cream cheese.  Talk about YUM!  I have a friend who lives in Boston now
column6: and she cannot stop talking about her love for their Crunchy Chicken sandwich.  For a college student
column7: a trip to Local Foods can be a bit expensive
column8: but I always had leftovers to take with me.  Their side salads are yummy
column9: and very creative.  They are on rotation
column10: yet they always seem to have quinoa and vegan potato salad.  Highly recommend challenging your taste buds
column11: or picking the Chicken Posole soup.
